He is in a retail business, selling bicycle spare parts and he obtains additional income from farming. He faces the challenges of low customer turnout and lack of enough capital for expansion. He has a vision of providing for his family's needs and he is a member of the village bank. 

Eldad is, therefore, requesting a loan to buy more bicycle spare parts to sell.

loans.use: to buy more bicycle spare parts to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more plastic bowls, buckets, plastic chairs, and food containers for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a most efficient cooking energy package that uses liquefied petroleum gas.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more bags of beans, native rice, and pepper for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a clean and efficient cooking energy package that uses liquefied petroleum gas.

loans.name: Mujeres Triunfadoras Group

texts.es:
El comité lleva por nombre MUJERES TRIUNFADORAS están en el 2do. ciclo con veinte integrantes. El grupo es antiguo y bastante unido, con  la  plena convicción de trabajar y ayudarse todas juntas, así facilitar el progreso y calidad de vida de todas.
Una de las integrantes la señora Raquel, quien se dedica a la venta de ropas, y es por medio de ese trabajo que está ayudando a su familia y a sus seres queridos. Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de prendas de invierno variadas, ya que se acerca la época de frío y quiere poder tener una buena variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
Todas están agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo, ya que les permitirá crecer, e ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias.
texts.en: The communal bank is called MUJERES TRIUNFADORAS and is in its 2nd loan cycle with twenty members. It is a long-standing and fairly close-knit group, with a strong belief in working and support each other, in order to enable progress and improve the quality of life of all members. One of the members is Raquel, who makes a living selling clothes, and supports her family and loved ones through this work. She is requesting this loan in order to invest in buying a variety of winter clothing, as the cold weather is on its way and she wants to have a good variety to offer her clients. All the members are grateful for the opportunity they are being given, as it will allow them to grow, and continue improving their living conditions and those of their families.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothes to sell.

loans.name: Renovacion Group

texts.es:
El comité RENOVACION, es de la ciudad  de Lambaré, está integrado por 18 mujeres muy trabajadoras y luchadoras, que se han unido para poder ayudarse las unas a las otras por medio del trabajo en conjunto y unido.
Antonia es una de estas mujeres, ella es una persona muy emprendedora y por sobre todo muy sacrificada, ella se dedica a la lavar ropas a mano, y también a planchar, es un trabajo muy duro, pero ella lo hace para poder ayudar a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de jabones, suavizantes, aromatizantes y demás productos para poder seguir con su trabajo como lo viene haciendo. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The RENOVACION group is from the city of Lambaré. It is made up of 18 very hardworking and determined women who have come together to be able to help each other by working together as a group.

Antonia is one of these women. She is a very enterprising woman, who is, more than anything, very selfless. She makes her living washing clothes by hand and also ironing. It is very hard work, but she does it to be able to help her family and dear ones.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in buying soaps, softeners, fragrances, and other products to be able to continue with her work as she has been doing. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is getting and that will be of great help to her.

loans.use: to buy soaps, softeners, fragrances, and other products.

loans.name: Santa Rosa 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Rosa 2 está en el 3er ciclo  del programa de comité de mujeres emprendedoras, donde todas están luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia. Son mujeres muy luchadoras y con ganas de poder crecer y salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes la Sra. Cecilia quien es modista, se dedica a la costura desde hace tiempo, también cuenta que su marido también trabaja por lo que ambos se ayudan para poder salir adelante. Según su primera de eliminación de pobreza se encuentra en el nivel 3, lo que quiere decir que está mejorando sus condiciones de vida, pero que debe seguir mejorando.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, gomas, botones y demás productos para poder seguir con las confecciones, y de esa forma mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group Santa Rosa 2 is in its third semester of the entrepreneurial women's committee program, where all the members are striving to improve living conditions for themselves and their families. They are very determined women, with great desires to grow and get ahead.

One of the members is Cecilia, who is a dressmaker. She has been sewing for quite some time. She also tells us that her husband also works, so they both help each other to be able to get ahead.

According to her first poverty elimination survey, she is in level 3, which says that her living conditions are improving, but that they need to continue improving.

She is asking for this loan to be able to invest it in buying cloth, thread, elastic, buttons and other products to be able to continue with her dressmaking, and in this way, improve her earnings.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, elastic, buttons, and other products.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy wheat flour, cookies, and yam.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.en:
Victoria is 60 years old, married, and has five children. She works very hard to provide for them. She operates a general store in the Philippines, which she has been doing for 12 years.

Victoria requested a loan from NWTF for 15,000 PHP, which she will use to buy shampoo, groceries, etc. to sell. In the future, Victoria would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase shampoo, groceries, etc.

loans.name: Ma. Elena

texts.en:
Ma. Elena is 31 years old and married, with two children who are in school. Ma. Elena works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a buy-and-sell ready-to-wear and school supplies business in the Philippines and she has requested a PHP 15,000 loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase more stocks to sell.

Ma. Elena has been in this business for three years. In the future, Ma. Elena would like to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks to sell.

loans.name: Ma. Gelly

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Ma. Gelly works hard to support her family.

She has a fishing business in the Philippines and earns additional income from fish-vending. Ma. Gelly is borrowing PHP 5,000 through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation, Inc. (NWTF) to purchase additional fishing net and other fishing materials for her fishing business.

Ma. Gelly has been sustaining her business activities through her past seven loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money, so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional fishing net and other fishing materials.

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.en:
Rosalina is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a business making dried fish in the Philippines.

She is borrowing PHP 3,000 through NWTF to purchase more fish to make dried fish for her business making dried fish.

Rosalina has been in this business for three years. She earns more income from fishing.

Rosalina has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving enough money so she could afford to send her children to college in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more fish to make dried fish

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en:
Godfrey is 33 years old, married, and has four children who attend school. He has 12 dependents under his care. Godfrey is an accountant, which he has been doing for seven years. Godfrey is hard working despite challenges of low salary and inadequate capital as he is the only income earner in his family. 

Godfrey requested a loan, which he will use to pay school fees for children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is 30 years old and has five children, three of whom attend school. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Teresa's business and home were destroyed by super typhoon Haiyan, which swept through the Philippines on November 8, 2013. She has restarted her business and now needs to provide her family with safe shelter.

Teresa requested a housing loan from NWTF for 10,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase materials and pay for labor to rebuild her family home. Teresa is committed to rebuilding her devastated life. In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase building materials and pay for construction labor

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
Este grupo Divino Niño Jesus  se encuentra en el 6to. Ciclo del programa de comités, cuenta con 17 integrantes actualmente pero solo 16 solicitan de este préstamo, es un grupo cuyas características son la integridad, responsabilidad, participativo en las reuniones y capacitaciones.
Una de las historias dignas de destacar es el de la señora  Nilda de 52 años, ella se dedica a la venta de leche y queso, ella se levanta muy temprano y realiza el ordeñe de sus vacas para luego salir a vender en forma ambulante. Su trabajo lo realiza con ayuda de su familia.
Ella con esta actividad es el  sostén económico de toda su familia.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos para elaborar sus quesos, ya que tiene muchos pedidos y quiere poder cumplir con todos sus clientes.
En la foto aparecen 17 mujeres, ya que el grupo tiene 17 miembros, pero en esta oportunidad solo 16 solicitan este préstamo.
texts.en: This group, Divino Niño Jesus, is in its 6th loan cycle in the communal banks program, currently has 17 members although only 16 of them are requesting this loan, and is a group characterised by its integrity, responsibility and participation in meetings and training. One noteworthy story is that of Nilda, who is 52 years of age, and makes a living by selling milk and cheese. She gets up early and milks her cows before going out to work as a travelling salesperson. Her family help her to carry out her work. With this work, she is the breadwinner for her entire family. She is requesting this loan to purchase ingredients for making cheese, as she has a lot of orders and wants to be able to satisfy all her customers. 17 woman appear in the photo, as the group has 17 members, but in this case only 16 of them are requesting this loan.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for making cheese.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
Este grupo se llama San Antonio, todas las integrantes a través del trabajo y esfuerzo han ido creciendo y mejorando sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias. Tienen como objetivo el crecimiento de cada una, no solo en lo económico, sino también como persona.
Aida es una buena costurera, y es gracias a este trabajo que está ayudando a su familia por medio de los ingresos que tiene, es muy buena en lo que hace, y es muy conocida en el barrio por su trabajo. Hoy pide este préstamo ya que quiere comprar telas, hilos, botones, cierres y demás, con lo cual podrá cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes, e ir mejorando además su servicio.
texts.en:
This group is called San Antonio. All the members have grown and improved their living conditions and those of their families by their hard work and effort. Their goal is for each member to grow, not only economically but also as a person.

Aida is a good seamstress, and it is thanks to this work that she is helping her family with the income she earns. She is very good at what she does, and is very well known in the area for her work. Today she is asking for this loan because she wants to buy items such as fabric, thread, buttons and fasteners. She will use this to meet her customers' orders and to continue to improve her services.

loans.use: to buy items such as fabric, thread, buttons and fasteners.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité se llama Kuña Guapa, que quiere decir mujer trabajadora, son 18 mujeres muy unidas, que con sacrificio y esfuerzo están luchando por poder mejorar sus vidas y las de su familia.
Laura es parte de este grupo, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas variadas, y comenta que se ha hecho de muy buena clientela gracias a que es muy buena para las ventas y siempre tiene una buena variedad que ofrece a sus clientes. Su sueño es poder tener una tienda grande donde pueda vender sus prendas y seguir luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar remeras, jeans, camisas, abrigos y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo, para procurar mejores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
The group committee is called Kuña Guapa, which means "hard-working woman". There are 18 very united women, who are fighting with sacrifice and effort in order to improve their lives and those of their families.

Laura is a member of this group. She sells various sorts of garments, and she comments that she has built up a good customer base because she is good at selling and because she always has a good variety of items to offer to her customers. Her dream is to be able to have a big shop where she could sell her garments and continue to fight to improve her living conditions.

She is asking for this loan to buy items such as T-shirts, jeans, shirts and coats. In this way she can carry on with her selling like she has been doing in order to increase income for her family.

loans.use: to buy items such as T-shirts, jeans, shirts and coats.

loans.name: Armela

texts.en:
Armela is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a rice farming business in the Philippines; she has been in this business for nine years. Armela earns more income from a general store and raising pigs.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies for her rice farming business.

Armela has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams of saving enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen is 51 years old and married, with four children. She earns a living by pig fattening in the Philippines. Carmen has been pig fattening for 15 years, and also earns additional income from food vending.

Carmen is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Margie

texts.en:
Margie is 38 years old and married, with two children. She works hard to provide for her family. 

She runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a PHP 45,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, canned goods, noodles, milk, etc.

Margie has borrowed and paid 32 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 30 years, and also earns an income from pig fattening.

Margie aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell like soap, shampoo, canned goods, noodles, milk, etc

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippine; she has been in this business for 35 years. Sofia earns more income from a buy and sell rice business, used clothing and tailoring.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she requested an additional loan to further build her business.

She is borrowing PHP 23,000 through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, soap, etc for her general store business.

Sofia has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of the loans from NWTF. 

She dreams of building and expanding her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell, like canned goods, eggs, soap, etc

loans.name: Cornelius

texts.en:
Cornelius is 59 years old, married, and has six children, four of whom attend school. He has been a church priest for 32 years and works 12 hours a day plus farms for additional income. Cornelius is an honest and faithful man though he meets a hardship of seasonal changes.

Cornelius requested a loan, which he will use to pay school fees for his children so they can have an improved standard of living.

loans.use: to pay school  fees for his children.

loans.name: Hussein

texts.en:
Hussein is a 69-year-old married male with three children, two of whom go to school.  They are living in Kasese, Uganda. 

Hussein has been a primary teacher at Rwenzori Royal primary school for 48 years so far. He likes teaching, because it makes him informed. 

Hussein wants money to pay school fees for his children. 

He hopes to see his children graduate at the university, although his challenge is low and delayed salary payments.

loans.use: To pay for school fees

loans.name: Vito

texts.en:
Vito is 39 years old, married, and has three children who attend school. They live in Kasese, Uganda. Vito has been a teacher for 15 years, working eight hours a day and likes his profession although, like other teachers, he complains of low salary.

Vito requested a loan, which he will use to buy materials such as stones and bricks for home construction.

loans.use: to buy materials such as stones and bricks for home construction.

loans.name: Kasusu Twekambe Group

texts.en:
Euphrazio is a member of the Kasusu Twekambe Group. She is  60 years old and has 10 children. She lives in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her main business is selling second-hand clothes, which she has been doing since 1982. She earns additional income working in a pub. She faces challenges of inadequate capital and labor force. 

Euphrazio requested a loan, which she will use to buy second-hand clothes to sell. She has a vision of bringing up her children to a self-sustainable status.

loans.use: to purchase second-hand clothes to sell.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia es de la ciudad de Pilar, ella se dedica a la venta de panificados que ella misma hace, y que después sale a vender. hace mas de 5 años que trabaja en esto, y con ello es que mantiene a su familia dándoles todo lo que necesitan.
Comenta que su préstamo anterior de kiva lo uso para la compra de insumos varios para elaborar sus panificados, lo cual le fue de mucha ayuda. Hoy pide de un nuevo préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de harina, levadura, huevos, y demás y así seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Lucia is from the city of Pilar. She is dedicated to selling bakery products which she makes and offers for sale. She has worked at this trade for more than 5 years, and it has enabled her to maintain her family, giving them what they need.

She comments that with her previous loan from Kiva, she purchased various inputs for making her baked goods, and it was a great help. Today, she is requesting a new loan to be able to invest in purchasing more wheat flour, yeast, eggs, and other ingredients, so she can continue working as she has been.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, yeast, eggs, and other ingredients for making bakery products.

loans.name: San Buenaventura Group

texts.es:
San buenaventura se encuentra en el ciclo 13 del programa de comités, tiene 17 integrantes actualmente , es un grupo solidario, activo y responsable que se está esforzando por mejorar y salir adelante.
Una de las historias dignas de destacar es el de la señora  Lourdes de 35 años, ella se dedica a la venta de comestibles en su casa, esta actividad lo hace desde hace varios con ayuda de sus hijos, tiene una clientela formada, que se pudo formar gracias a la buena comida que ella hace. Su sueño es tener una tienda donde pueda vender sus comidas, y de esa forma no tener que vender de manera ambulante.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar verduras, carne, condimentos, panes y demás, y de esa forma poder seguir haciendo sus comidas, y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en: San Buenaventura is in its 13th loan cycle in the communal banks program, currently has 17 members, and is a mutually supportive, active and responsible group that is striving to improve and get ahead. One noteworthy story is that of Lourdes, who is 35 years old, and makes a living by selling groceries from home. She has been in this line of work for a number of years, has the help of her children, and has been able to establish a customer base thanks to the good food that she makes. Her dream is to have a shop where she can sell her meals, and thereby not have to be a travelling salesperson. She is requesting this loan in order to purchase vegetables, meat, condiments, breads and more, thereby enabling her to continue to make her meals and to fight to improve her living conditions and those of her family.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables, meat, condiments, breads and more

loans.name: Nilsa

texts.es:
Nilsa trabaja actualmente en varios Colegios pero aún le falta terminar su Licenciatura en ciencias de la educación.
Ella es Hija de una Profesora ya Jubilada y dice que su madre es su mayor ejemplo, ya que es una persona trabajadora y muy luchadora, que es una muy buena profesional, útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus gastos de matriculación, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Nilsa currently works in several schools but has not yet finished her degree in education sciences.

She is the daughter of a retired professor and says that her mother is her greatest example. Her mother is a hard-working and very determined person, who is a very good professional and useful to society.

She is requesting this loan to pay her tuition expenses, so that she can continue with her studies, as she is now.

loans.use: to pay university tuition

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es: La señora Sandra tiene 26 años, es soltera pero tiene una pequeña hija dependiente, sus padres le colaboraron para hacerle estudiar hasta el nivel bachillerato, pero a pesar de no contar con la ayuda de sus padres para estudiar el nivel universitario decidió hacerlo por su cuenta por lo que actualmente sigue estudiando por las tardes y paralelamente trabaja en la broasteria que abrió por las noches en la casa de su madre la cual le colabora con el cuidado de su hija mientras ella realiza sus actividades. Vive en Cochabamba junto a su madre, ahora solicita el presente crédito para la compra de mesas y sillas para su negocio ya cuenta con pocas y las mimas son antiguas, de esta forma mejorara su negocio y las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Sandra is 26 years old, single, and has a young daughter who depends on her.  Her parents helped out so she could finish high school, but even though they were not able to help her study at university, she decided to do it on her own and continues to study in the evenings and works at a broasterie at night.  She opened it in her mother’s house and her mother helps take care of her daughter while she completes her activities.  She lives in Cochabamba with her mother and is asking for this loan to buy tables and chairs for her business.  She doesn’t have very many at the moment and the one she has are old.  This way she can improve her business and quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Liza

texts.es:
Liza es abogada, de la ciudad de Pilar, tiene una hija, está separada, vive con su hermana. 
Ella comenta que con mucho esfuerzo logró terminar su carrera y ahora que culminó está especializándose en metodología de la investigación. 
Ella quiere seguir creciendo, es por eso que sigue estudiando, ya que sabe que la única forma de ser alguien en la vida es capacitándose y luchando por ir incrementando el conocimiento.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar las cuotas de sus clases, ya que de esa forma podrá seguir luchando por su meta.
texts.en:
Liza is a lawyer in the city of Pilar. She has one daughter, is separated and lives with her sister.
She says that she managed to finish her course with a great deal of effort, and now that she has finished she is specialising in investigative methodology.

She wants to continue to develop, which is why she is carrying on with her studies. She knows that the only way of becoming someone in life is by becoming qualified and fighting to increase her knowledge.

She is asking for this loan to be able to pay for her tuition fees, as this is how she can continue fighting to achieve her goal.

loans.use: to pay for tuition fees.

loans.name: Enid

texts.en:
Enid is a 30-year-old female with four children, all attending school, living in Kasese, Uganda. She has been operating a women's salon (hairdressing) for 11 years. She started her business to look after her family. 

Enid needs a loan to buy hair weaves and dryers for her salon in order to improve her services. She is hard-working, despite a challenge of competition.

loans.use: to buy hair weaves and dryers for her salon.

loans.name: Rosalba

texts.es:
Rosalba es de la ciudad de Carapeguá, está estudiando la carrera de enfermería, y su objetivo es graduarse en el área de salud como Lic. En enfermería y seguir creciendo como profesional.
Ella es una mujer muy dedicada que está luchando por poder ser una profesional exitosa que ayude a las demás personas.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en pagar sus cuotas de universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir luchando por sus sueños. Agradece por esta oportunidad que esta recibiendo.
texts.en:
Rosalba is from the city of Carapeguá. She is studying nursing, and her goal is to graduate in the health care field as a licensed nurse and continue growing as a professional.

She is a very dedicated woman who is striving to be able to be a successful professional who helps others.

She is requesting this loan to invest it in the payment of her university fees, so that she can continue fighting for her dreams. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving.

loans.use: to pay university fees

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra vive en la ciudad de Caaguazú, además de trabajar también está estudiando, su carrera elegida es la de contabilidad, que según comenta le abrirá muchas puertas en su vida profesional.
Ella quiere ser una profesional útil a la sociedad, es por eso que se está esforzando mucho para poder cumplir su meta.
 Ella pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en sus gastos de manutención y de transporte, ya que en su día a día de la universidad tiene muchos gastos que quiere cubrir. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo y que le será muy útil.
texts.en:
Sandra lives in the city of Caaguazú. In addition to working, she is also studying. Her chosen major is accounting, which will open many doors in her professional life.

She wants to be a professional who is useful to society. For this reason, she is making a great effort to achieve her goal.

She is requesting this loan to invest it in living and transportation expenses because in her day-to-day life at the university she has many expenses that she wants to cover. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving, which will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: to pay for living and transportation expenses

loans.name: Juntas Venceremos Group

texts.es: El grupo solidario lo integran tres socios esforzados y lo coordina la señora Namilet de 33 años de edad, acompañada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 10 y 12 años por quien se ha superado para ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida, se dedica a la venta de comida rápida en el centro de salud de su localidad desde hace 8 años, por medio de los créditos ha logrado implementar la venta de ropa y perfumes y el crédito lo solicita para la compra de marucham, aceite, arroz, repollo, pan, salsa de tomate, crema, etc., pero también invertirá en camisetas, blusas, talladores, licras, blúmer y bóxer, otros logros de la socia es la mejora en su vivienda, mantenimiento del carro hot-dog y lo más importante que es la oportunidad de trabajar en su vivienda para estar al cuido de sus hijos. Los otros socios son la señora Milagros de 30 años comerciante de ropa y sandalias de manera ambulante en su comunidad, y el señor Wilfredo de 54 años quien ofrece el servicio de refresco y frutas en su domicilio.
texts.en:
The communal bank is comprised of three energetic members.  Namilet, age 33, coordinates the group.  She is in a relationship, and she has two children, ages 10 and 12.  It is for them that she has improved herself in order to give them a better quality of life.

She has been selling fast food in the health center in her area for eight years.  Through the loans she has managed to put into place a business of selling clothes and perfume.  She is requesting the loan to buy instant noodles, cooking oil, rice, cabbage, bread, tomato sauce, and cream, etc.  However, she will also buy t-shirts, blouses, work clothes, athletic clothing, and underwear.

The member’s other achievements are improving her house and maintaining her hot dog cart.  The most important thing is the opportunity to work at her house in order to care for her children.

Milagros, age 30, who sells clothes and sandals in an itinerant manner in her community, is also a member.  The other member, Wilfredo, age 54, sells soft drinks and fruit from his home.

loans.use: to buy instant noodles, cooking oil, rice, cabbage, bread, tomato sauce, and cream,  t-shirts, blouses, work clothes, athletic clothing, and underwear.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en: Annet is a forty-two-year-old, single female with two children who both attend school. Annet has been selling veterinary chemicals like fertilizers and pesticides for two plus farming as additional income. Annet intends to use her loan to buy fertilizers and pesticides to sell, as building a residential house is her dream. Annet is a hard-working lady who is challenged by the unpredictable changes in weather.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers and pesticides to sell.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en: Jane is a thirty-five-year-old, married female with four children all going to school and living in Kasese, Uganda. Jane has been running a retail shop for four years and works twelve hours a day.  Jane began the business to pay the school fees of her children.  Her major challenges are competition and price fluctuations. Jane needs money to buy sugar, soap and palm oil to sell.

loans.use: to buy sugar, soap and palm oil to sell.

loans.name: Maria Argentina

texts.es: Doña María Argentina, habita junto a su compañero de vida en su humilde casita que con esfuerzo propio ha construido, cuenta con la ayuda de su compañero de vida en los gastos del hogar pues el recibe ingresos de manera irregular por la compra y venta de ganado, María Argentina  ha luchado por salir adelante y mejorar sus ingresos se dedica a la venta de cosas de horno como también a la agricultura esta, vez necesita su financiamiento para comprar insumos como maíz para la siembra, fertilizantes, herbicidas pagar mano de obra para la preparación del suelo y sembrar su propio maíz y no tener que comprar para elaboración de cosas de horno, este maíz será sembrado en una manzana de tierra que le proporciona el suegro a dos kilómetros aproximadamente de su vivienda y el marido estará al cuido de esta cosecha.  su mayor propósito es contar con su terreno propio para no tener que andar prestando en un futuro para realizar su producción en lo propio.
texts.en: María Argentina lives with her life companion in a humble house that she built with her own effort. Her life companion helps her with the household expenses as he gets income irregularly from buying and selling cattle. María Argentina has struggled to get ahead and increase her income. She works selling baked goods as well as farming. At this time she needs a loan to buy inputs like corn for seeding, fertilizer, herbicide, and to pay for labor to prepare the land and plant her own corn so that she doesn't need to buy the supplies for her baked goods. The corn will be planted on a manzana of land that belongs to her father-in-law, two kilometers from her house. Her husband will look after the crop. Her main goal is to have her own land so that in the future she doesn't have to borrow land but have her production on her own land.

loans.use: to purchase maize seed and fertilizer to make her baked goods

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
Francisca es de la ciudad de Caaguazú, comenta que desde muy joven tuvo que salir a la calle a trabajar, específicamente desde los 13 años y de esa forma poder cubrir sus estudios.
Hoy estudia la carrera de contabilidad, en lo que se está esmerando bastante para poder cumplir con su meta, que es llegar a ser una profesional útil a la sociedad.
Pide este préstamo para poder pagar sus cuotas de la universidad, y de esa forma poder seguir su meta de ser una profesional útil a la sociedad.
texts.en:
Francisca is from the city of Caaguazú. She says that from a young age she had to work outside her home, specifically since she was 13, in order to pay for her studies.

Today she is studying for a degree in accounting, and she is putting forth a lot of effort to accomplish her goal, which is to become a professional who is useful to society.

She is requesting this loan to be able to cover her university expenses, so that she can continue toward her goal of being a professional useful to society.

loans.use: to cover university fees

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly está trabajando y estudiando para poder salir adelante y asi brindarle una mejor vida económica a  sus hijos, ya que es madre soltera.
Ella debe cubrir sus estudios y también los gastos de su hogar. Su objetivo es terminar su carrera y ejercer su profesión.
Nelly se está esforzando por una vida mejor a través de sus estudios, y comenta que pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su universidad, y de esa forma poder estudiar y cumplir su meta. Agradece por esta oportunidad que está recibiendo y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Nelly is working and studying to be able to forge ahead and provide a more financially secure life for her children, as she is a single mother. She needs to pay for her schooling and also cover her household expenses. Her goal is to complete her degree and practice her profession.

Nelly is striving for a better life through her studies, and she says that she is requesting this loan to cover her university fees, so that she can study and achieve her goal. She is grateful for this opportunity that she is receiving, which will be very helpful to her.

loans.use: to cover university fees

loans.name: Petrona Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Petrona tiene  52 años de edad,es  soltera y madre de dos hijos, un hijo de 17 años que esta bajo su cargo y el otro hijo es mayor de edad y  es independiente. Petrona  se dedica a la elaboración de camisas y mangas en su domicilio, tiene ocho trabajadores remunerados y solicita el crédito para la compra de materia prima como   tela, hilo, satín, elásticos, adornos, etc., con los créditos anteriores la socia ha logrado construir parte de su vivienda y adquirio una maquina industrial para  aumentar el negocio, esto la ha motivado para seguir prestando en la institución.
texts.en: Petrona, 52. is single and the mother of two sons, one who is 17 years old and the other is older and independent.  Petrona makes her living creating shirts and sleeves in her house.  She has eight paid workers and she requests the loan in order to buy cloth, thread, satin, elastics, trimmings, etc.  With the previous loans, the partner was able to construct part of her house and acquire an industrial machine to increase the business.  This has motivated her to continue borrowing from the institution.

loans.use: to buy cloth, thread, satin, elastics, trimmings, etc.

loans.name: Ilba Lenith

texts.es:
Ilba Lenith, tiene la edad de 30 años, está casado y tiene 2 hijo que son su mayor prioridad. Ella con el credito quiere comprar los insumos para la asistencia de su siembra de maiz y frijol. Ella y su esposo se dedican a la produccion de los granos basicos y cuentan con un terreno apto para esta explotacion de cultivo por lo cual siempre han trabajado en esto. Ella actualmente van a sembrar la semilla y necesitan comprar los fertilizantes y todo tipo de fumigacion necesario para asi poder darle un buena asistencia y generar mayores cosechas para este año. Ella espera poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida y poder brindarlea sus hijos la capacidad de seguir estudiando para que sean profesionales.

Es el segundo préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Ilba Lenith is 30 years old, she is married and has two children who are her main priority. With her loan she wants to buy supplies to help her corn and bean crops.

She and her husband have always worked producing basic grains as they have a plot of land suitable for these crops. She is currently about to sow the seeds and needs to buy fertilisers and various sprays necessary to support the crops and generate a better harvest for this year. 

She hopes to be able to give her family a better quality of life and enable her children to continue studying so they can become professionals.

This is the second loan she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has had no previous loans from state banks, but FUDECOSUR has offered her the loan with better terms and much lower interest rates.

loans.use: to support her corn and bean crops.

loans.name: Erick

texts.es:
Erick, tiene la edad de 22 años, está casado y vive con su esposa que es su mayor prioridad. El con el credio va comprar los materiales para la mejora de su hogar. El espera con este dinero comprar cemento, madera, y blocks para darle un mejor acavado a su hogar. El tiene como meta brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su esposa y un hogar digno y seguro para cuando lleguen sus hijos.

Es el primer préstamo que recibido de FUDECOSUR. El no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Erick is 22 years old. He is married and lives with his wife, who is his top priority. With the loan, he is going to buy materials to improve his home. With the money, he hopes to buy cement, wood, and concrete blocks to give his house a better finish. His goal is to provide a better quality of life to his wife and a decent and safe home for when their children arrive.

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. Previously, he had not taken out other loans with state banks, but FUDECOSUR provided him a loan with better terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy materials for improvements to his home

loans.name: Maria Esther

texts.es:
María Esther de 27 años, es calificada como una mujer que rompe los esquemas tradicionales. Todos los días, desde hace 8 años, despierta a las 5:00am para salir a vender ambulante al norte del país fajas, bisuterías, relojes y billeteras. Siendo este un trabajo usualmente hecho por hombres, no sirvió de impedimento para poder conseguir entrar en el negocio para poder sustentar la educación y la alimentación de sus dos hijos de 8 y 7 años. Anteriormente vendía comida y refrescos en un tramo familiar en el mercado, sin embargo le llamó la atención su actual negocio, donde no dudo entrar con un capital de C$ 500.00 córdobas vendiendo en el mismo lugar, hasta que fue creciendo poco a poco y decidió moverse a las comunidades cercanas.
Afortunadamente, la familia de María Esther siempre la ha apoyado, pues no tiene otros ingresos. En estos momentos necesita de un préstamo para comprar más relojes, bisutería y fajas, para incrementar su mercadería y así moverse en más comunidades de las que actualmente tiene. Entre sus planes está llegara tener un punto fijo en el mercado donde pueda exhibir su producto, no obstante, por el momento, quiere aumentar su producto y ofrecer más variedad.
texts.en:
María Esther, 27 years old, is a woman that breaks traditional gender roles. Every day for the last 8 years she has woken up at 5 a.m. to go out and sell belts, jewelry, watches, and wallets in the northern region. This is usually a job carried out by men, though this has not stopped her from being able to enter this business. María Esther works in order to feed her children (8 and 7 years old) and provide them with a good education. 

Previously, she worked selling food and soft drinks in a familiar section of the local market. However, her current business caught her attention because she is able to enter the market with the capital of 500 cordobas by selling in the same place. Her business grew little by little and she decided to move into nearby communities. Fortunately, María Esther's family has always supported her. She has no other source of income. 

Currently, María Esther needs this loan in order to buy more watches, jewelry, and belts so that she can increase her merchandise and expand to more communities than she currently has. She plans to eventually obtain a fixed spot in the market where she can display her products. Nevertheless, for the moment, María Ester hopes to increase her product and offer a bigger variety.

loans.use: to buy more watches, jewelry, and belts.

loans.name: Sebastian Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SEBASTIAN” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Santago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora María es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de mariscos, venta de uva, tejido de mantas, venta de carne y pollo, venta de verduras, venta de ropa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora María es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una compañera de la institución que fue a visitarle a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de mariscos; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio como empleada, realizando la actividad de des escamar, posteriormente decide abrir su propio espacio de comercialización.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de pescados por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la cuidad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en los hoteles de la Ciudad de La Paz. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en unión libre  y tiene un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la facilidad del préstamo y el ahorro que le ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Sebastian" will start its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer in the Santago II central office.  This group has 8 members, and is led by a board of directors where Maria is the secretary.  The members of this group have a variety of businesses including: food sales, seafood sales, grape sales, blanket weaving, meat and chicken sales, vegetable sales, and clothing sales.

This loan will benefit the small business-women in Maria's group.  She says that this is the first time that she has taken a loan with Pro Mujer.  She joined at the invitation of a friend who was a member of the institution who came to visit her in her house.  She currently has a business selling seafood.  She got to know this business starting out as an employee scaling the fish.  Later she decided to open her own business selling seafood.

The loan that Maria will take will be used to increase her capital (to buy fish at wholesale).  She will buy the fish from the wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto, and later sell them to the hotels in the city of La Paz.  Working this way, she is able to generate resources to support her family.  She is in a common-law marriage and has one child.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answered that she likes the easy terms on the loans and the savings accounts that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy fish at wholesale

loans.name: Ismael

texts.es:
El señor Ismael tiene 40  años  de edad  es casado tiene dos hijos que dependen de él, radica en la comunidad de Langue, Valle al sur de la región de Honduras, se dedica desde hace mas de 8 años al negocio de la venta de verduras, plásticos y achinería, sus clientes están en el mercado en Langue Valle, y también el sale a vender de forma ambulante.
Don Israel esta solicitando el préstamo para compra de productos como: pailas, cubetas, platos plásticos, también verduras como: cebolla, tomates, chiles, repollo y otros,  es su segundo crédito que solicita de 5,000.00 lempiras. Don Ismael es una persona muy humilde que lucha para mejorar su calidad de vida.
El con las ganancias y parte de los créditos ha hecho pila, sanitario, y está levantando la Paredes de su casa de bloque, su sueño es tener una casa de bloque donde pueda estar bien con su familia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Marzo del 2014.
texts.en:
Ismael, 40, is married and has two dependent children. He lives in Langue Valle, in the southern part of the Honduras region. For over 8 years, he has been selling vegetables, plastic items, and cheap items. His customers come to the market in his town and he also sells door-to-door. He asks for a loan in order to buy merchandise (basins, pails, plastic plates, etc.) and vegetables (onions, tomatoes, sweet chilis, cabbages, etc.). This is his second loan and he is asking for 5,000 lempiras. Ismael is a very humble person who struggles to improve his standard of living. He used his income and part of his previous loan to improve his house, installing a sink, a toilet, and building walls. His dream is to have a house made of solid materials where he would be able to live decently with his family. 
San Lorenzo, Honduras - March 2014

loans.use: to buy merchandise and food to sell.

loans.name: Godfrey

texts.en: Godfrey is a sixty-two year old married male with six children of which four attend school. Godfrey is a farmer who also sells milk for additional income. He  works eight hours a day. Godfrey began the business to look after his family. Educating children is his dream. He faces a difficulty of high transportation costs and thieves. Godfrey intends to use the loan to pay for fertilizers, pesticides, weeding, and planting.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizers, pesticides, weeding, and planting.

loans.name: Patrick William

texts.en: Patrick used a previous loan to buy rice, sugar, and salt to sell. He operates a retail shop and also has a pork joint business to earn extra income. Like most traders, he faces the challenge of price fluctuations and inadequate capital. His dream is to improve on his pork joint so as to get more income and customers. Patrick William is requesting a loan to buy bread, sugar, cooking oil, and salt to sell.

loans.use: to buy bread, sugar, cooking oil, and salt to sell.

loans.name: Victor Manuel

texts.es:
Víctor tiene 61 años  de edad,  estudió hasta tercer grado, está casado y su esposa es ama de casa,  sus tres hijos viven con él, 

Él es agricultor, tiene más de veinte años de realizar la actividad, su padre desde pequeño le enseñó a trabajar a ser responsable con lo que hacía y decía, también cuida ganado, tiene tres vacas que ordeña y trabaja de 5:00 AM  a 12:00 MD.


El préstamo será invertido para comprar  los insumos agrícolas (abonos, herbicidas) y de esta forma asegurar una excelente cosecha.


El sueño más deseado es poder seguir trabajando, siempre que su estado de salud se lo permita, espera que sus hijos al igual que el sean personas de bien. Con las ganancias que la actividad le produzca, un porcentaje será para el pago de la cuota del préstamo y lo de más en inversión en su casa.
texts.en:
Victor is 61 years old. He went to school until the third grade. He is married and his wife is a housewife. His three children live with him. He is a farmer who has been working in agriculture for 20 years. Since he was little, his father taught him to be responsible in what he does and says. He also takes care of cattle. He has three milking cows and works from a:00 to 12:00 PM. 

The loan will be used in order to buy agricultural products (manure and herbicides) and ensure an excellent harvest. His biggest dream is to be able to keep working provided that he is healthy enough to do it. He hopes that his children will be good people. With the money he earns from this activity, a portion will be used to make loan payments and the rest will be invested in his home.

loans.use: to buy agricultural products (manure and herbicides)

loans.name: Mujeres Al Poder Group

texts.es:
Este grupo lleva por nombre mujeres al poder, donde todas están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza, para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida de cada una, por medio del trabajo unido de todas.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Marta, quien en su última encuesta mostró un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel uno, lo que quiere decir que en su encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza ha tenido varios niveles bajos. Entre el trabajo que ella hace comenta que se dedica a la venta de leche por todo su barrio,  también se debe destacar el trabajo de las asesoras, quienes hacen un seguimiento permanente de capacitaciones y verificaciones que de alguna manera exigen y al mismo tiempo incentivan a las mujeres a luchar para poder superar la pobreza.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de leche para la venta, lo que le permitirá seguir trabajando como lo viene haciendo, y luchando por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
This group is called Mujeres al Poder (Women in Power), and every member is part of the "Poverty Stoplight" survey, which helps improve living conditions for every member through their joint work.

One of the members is Marta, who came out with a poverty level of one in her last survey, which means that she registered several low levels in her survey. Out of the tasks she carries out, she says that her main work is selling milk throughout her neighbourhood. She also wants to highlight the work of the assessors, who continually monitor repayments and carry out checks that require and, at the same time, incentivise the women to fight to overcome poverty. Marta is asking for this loan to invest in buying milk for sale, which will allow her to carry on working in this way and fighting to improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy milk for sale.

loans.name: Boqueron Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “BOQUERON” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Tejada, está compuesta por nueve integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Maritza es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: confección de mantas, venta de chompas, artesano, servicio de transporte, tienda de barrio, venta de ropa.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Maritza es integrante, ella indica que es el segundo año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de mercadería de ferretería; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio cuando se casó, ya que su esposo comercializaba estos productos, con un capital obtenido en Pro Mujer decide implementar su negocio independientemente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de materiales de ferretería por mayor) que adquirirá en las ferias de las fronteras Bolivia - Chile y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros y el área de salud que le ofrece la institución
texts.en:
The Boqueron communal bank will begin its second cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Villa Tejada regional center.  It is comprised of nine members, and it is led by a board of directors.  Maritza is the president.  The businesses that the members of the association carry out are varied, and among them are making blankets, selling sweaters, handicrafts, transportation service, neighborhood store, and selling clothes.

The loan that they will take out will benefit small business people where Maritza is a member.  She says that this is her second year as a member of Pro Mujer.  She joined by invitation from a friend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has a business of selling hardware merchandise.  She started this business when she got married because her husband sold these products.  With some capital from Pro Mujer, she decided to set up her business independently.

The loan that she will now take out is to increase capital (to buy hardware materials wholesale).  She will get the materials at the fairs on the border of Bolivia and Chile.  She will later sell them at her sales space.  This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family.  She is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she replied that she likes the savings and the health services that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy hardware materials wholesale.

loans.name: 4 Arenitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “4 ARENITAS” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Martha es la Secretaria. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de frutas, taller de costura, taller de pintura, venta de ropa de bebe, costura de faldas y busos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Martha es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de curandera de medicina natural; da a conocer que este negocio fue un negocio familiar es por ello que decide continuarlo y que sea su fuente de generación económica.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de puesto de venta) que adquirirá en una feria de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente se instalará para su comercio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener a su familia ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones que le ofrecen en la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank 4 Arenitas is starting its second cycle with Pro Mujer, within the regional hub of Villa Exaltación. It comprises eight members and is managed by a board of directors where Marta is acting Secretary. The businesses run by the members of this communal bank are varied. They include fruit sales, a sewing shop, a paint shop, baby clothing sales, and making skirts and sweaters.

The loan they are requesting will benefit small microentrepreneurs like Marta. She states that she has belonged to Pro Mujer for one year and joined through a friend who was already a member and invited her. She currently works as a healer, selling natural medicines. She says this was a family business, which is why she decided to keep it going so that it could become her source of income.
 
She is requesting this loan to increase capital by acquiring a stand in the town market of El Alto. She will then set up her business there. This work allows her to generate resources in order to support her family, since she is in a common-law marriage and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she enjoys the meetings they offer.

loans.use: Compra de puesto de venta

loans.name: 14 De Agosto Group

texts.es:
14 de agosto se llama este grupo de la ciudad de Itá, las integrantes de este grupo hacen actividades diversas para poder ir creciendo y mejorando. También están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza que les permitirá conocer la situación de cada una de ellas, y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Una de las personas que integra este grupo es la Sra. Isabelina, quien aparte de integrar el grupo, también es la directora. Ella es una persona muy trabajadora, que empieza su día a día desde muy tempranas horas, ya que tiene que preparar sus productos de repostería que vende. Se hizo ya de muy buena clientela gracias a que siempre tiene muy buen trabajo y es muy aceptado pode todos.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en comprar harina, huevos, manteca, levadura y demás productos para poder seguir haciendo los insumos de repostería para poder seguir con la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe y que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
14 de Agosto  [14th of August} is the name of this group from the city of Itá.  The members of this group have various occupations so as to be able to continue growing and improving.   They are also carrying out the survey for ending poverty which will allow them to know the circumstances of each member and be able to work in accordance.

One of the members of this group is Isabelina who,  besides being part of the group,  is its director.  She is a very hard working person, who starts every day at an early hour, since she must prepare the pastries she sells.  She already has attracted a good customer base thanks to always doing good work very acceptable to everyone. 

Isabelina is asking for this loan to buy flour, eggs, butter, yeast and other products so that she can continue to make a stock of pastries to sell. She is thankful to have this opportunity which will help her a lot.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, butter, yeast and other products

loans.name: Yana Pacuna Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “YANA PACUNA” iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Lucy es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de pantalones, costura de enaguas (faldas tradicionales), venta de carne, tienda de abarrotes, taller de costura de deportivos, venta de comida, venta de chompas, venta de artículos de vidrio.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Lucy es integrante, ella indica que hace cuatro años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina que es socia en la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de coca; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió hace cuatro años, cuando decide participar en Pro Mujer, ya teniendo el conocimiento de la venta de este producto.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de coca por mayor) que adquirirá de las comerciantes de la ciudad de La Paz y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella vive en concubinato  y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de crédito que ofrece la institución y su grupo.
texts.en:
The "Yana Pacuna" communal bank is starting its seventh loan cycle at the Collpani regional office of "Pro Mujer". The group has eight members, and is run by a board of directors that has Lucy as its president. The members have different businesses, including selling trousers, making "enaguas" (traditional skirts), selling meat, grocery stores, production of sports clothes, selling meals, selling jumpers, and selling glass products.

This loan will benefit microenterprises in Lucy's group. Lucy herself tells us that she joined "Pro Mujer" four years ago, following an invitation from a neighbour who was a member of the organisation. Lucy currently has a business selling coca leaves. She tells us that she started this business four years ago when she decided to join "Pro Mujer"; she also already knew how to sell the product.

This loan will be used to increase capital by buying more coca leaves from sellers in the city of La Paz; Lucy will then sell the leaves. This work allows Lucy to earn an income to support her family; she has a partner and two children.

When asked what she likes about "Pro Mujer", Lucy responds that she likes the loans and her group.

loans.use: to buy coca leaves in bulk.

loans.name: Rosemary

texts.en:
Rosemary, a 44-year-old married mother of seven living in Fort Portal, Uganda, has a bakery and a brick-laying business. She faces the challenges posed by weather changes. 

 Rosemary is requesting this  loan to buy baking powder, cooking oil and wheat flour for baking. Included in her future plans are building a good house and buying a motorcycle for business expansion.

loans.use: to buy baking powder, cooking oil and wheat flour for baking.

loans.name: Jane

texts.en:
Jane, age 58, sells fresh food items and firewood to earn a living. Her primary challenges are weather changes and inadequate capital for expansion. Nevertheless, she would like eventually to build a commercial establishment for her business.

Jane has six children and lives in Fort Portal.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy fresh foods like tomatoes and beans to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy fresh foods like tomatoes and beans to offer for sale

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Paul, age 37, sells maize and beans to earn a living. His primary challenges are price fluctuation and high transportation costs. He engages in farming to earn additional income.

Paul and his wife have four children and live in Fort Portal. His goal is to expand the scope of his business so that he may eventually ensure the higher education of his children.

Paul is requesting a loan in order to buy maize and beans to offer for sale.

loans.use: to buy maize and beans to offer for sale

loans.name: Holida

texts.ru: Холида много лет не имела источника дохода. Так как ее муж имеет маленькую зарплату и не в состоянии обеспечить своих детей со всеми не обходимыми средствами, она решила организовать свой бизнес. С такой целью она участвовала в курсе «Добейся Успеха» организованной Ассоциация Деловых Женщин. Она участвовала на этом курсе и получила много позитива для себя. После завершения курса она получила сертификат. Теперь она готова начать бизнес, однако она не имеет денег, чтобы купить скот. Скот она будет держать дома, где она имеет большой коровник. Она планирует купить скот, откармливать несколько месяцев и перепродавать на местном рынке. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 2000 сомони для покупки скота. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Holida has not had a source of income for many years. Because her husband has a small salary and cannot provide his children with all of the necessities, she decided to organize her own business. With this goal in mind, she participated in the "Achieve Success" course, organized by the Association of Business Women. She took part in this course and obtained a lot of positivity for herself. She received a certificate after completing the course. Now she is ready to start her business, but does not have money to buy livestock. She will keep livestock at home, where she has a large cowshed. Holida plans to buy livestock, fatten it up for several months and resell at a local market. She is requesting a loan in the amount of 2000 somoni to buy livestock. She awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy livestock in order to start her own business

loans.name: Gorreti

texts.en:
Gorreti used her previous loan funds to buy pharmaceutical items to offer for sale in her pharmacy. She has continued with her pharmacy business, but she also operates a pub for additional income. Her primary hardships are limited capital and competition. Nevertheless, she dreams of opening up outlets in nearby towns, thereby expanding her businesses. 

Gorreti is requesting a loan in order to buy soda, beer, and water to offer for sale in her pub.

loans.use: to buy soda, beer, and water to offer for sale in her pub

loans.name: María Olivia

texts.es:
Maria es una mujer de 54 años muy emprendedora y le encanta recolectar éxitos (derecha, de blusa color naranja)
Ella tiene una miscelánea ubica en el municipio de Jardín, Antioquia y recientemente abrió otra en Itagüí, Antioquia con muy buena acogida afortunadamente, gracias al apoyo de los fondos prestados por Interactuar.
Ella desea expandir aun más su negocio y generar más empleos por las personas de los sectores cercanos como la chica a la izquierda, de blusa color azul. Así como lo hace actualmente, por eso requiere comprar un amplio inventario de productos que normalmente vende como útiles escolares, afiches, algunas golosinas, DVD y algunos productos de higiene personal.
Con estos elementos podrá ampliar su alcance y podrá tener un nivel de ventas más elevado al tener siempre sus productos disponibles para los clientes.
Manifiesta que disfruta mucho de su actividad como comerciante y que es algo que la apasiona.
su vida familiar a mejorado considerablemente ya que ha logrado obtener una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María, age 54, is very enterprising.  She loves to accumulate successes (on the right in the orange color blouse).

She has a business selling miscellaneous goods in the Jardín municipality in Antioquia.  She has recently opened another in Itagüí in Antioquia.  Fortunately, it is very well-received, thanks to the support of the loan from Interactuar.

She wishes to expand her business even more and generate more jobs like she is currently doing with her employee on the left, in the blue shirt.  However, this requires that she buy an ample inventory of products that she normally sells like school supplies, posters, some candy, DVD’s, and some personal hygiene products.

With these items she will be able to expand her reach, and she will be able to have a higher level of sales because she will always have products available for the customers.

She states that she really enjoys her business activity as a merchant, and she is passionate about it.

Her family life has improved considerably because she has managed to obtain a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy school supplies, posters, some candy, DVD’s, and some personal hygiene products to increase her inventory.

loans.name: Carlos Xavier

texts.es:
San Miguel de los Bancos el Cantón del Amor, un Cantón de clima cálido húmedo, el mismo cuenta varios sitios de descanso que son muy visitado por turistas nacionales y extranjeros, como tradición tienen las fiestas del Cantón en las cuales se realizan bailes populares y la famosa quema del castillo la gente en este Cantón es muy amable y tranquila con todos sus visitantes. 
En este Cantón vive y trabaja el señor Carlos un joven de 19 años es soltero no tiene hijos, él trabaja muy duro se dedica a la construcción, a este trabajo le dedica un promedio de 8 horas al día, el viene de una familia de bajos recursos económicos sus padres solo le pudieron dar la primaria y el por su cuenta con su trabajo está estudiando la secundaria, nació y creció en una finca ganadera y conoce mucho de esta actividad por lo que solicita este crédito para emprender en su propio negocio que sería la compra de unas vacas productoras de leche,
Con esta inversión mejorará mucho sus ingresos y podrá continuar con sus estudios y mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia, Carlos agradece a Fundación Alternativa y Kiva por el apoyo y las oportunidades brindadas.
texts.en:
San Miguel de los Bancos is the canton of love, a canton with a warm, humid climate and has various vacation places that are frequented by domestic and international tourists. Traditionally they have festivals of the canton, where there are popular dances and the famous burning of the castle. The people of this canton are very friendly and peaceful with all of the visitors.

Carlos lives and works in this canton. This 19-year-old young man is single and doesn't have any children. He works very hard in construction and works an average of 8 hours each day. He comes from a family of limited economic resources, and his parents could only give him a primary school education and, on his own, he is attending secondary school. He was born and raised on a cattle farm and knows this business well, so he asks for a loan to start his own business which would be to buy some dairy cows.  

With this investment, he will increase his income a lot and will be able to continue his studies and improve the quality of life for himself and his family. Carlos thanks Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for the support and the opportunities offered.

loans.use: to purchase dairy cows and start his business.

loans.name: Cruz Antonio

texts.es:
Cruz tiene 42 años de edad, estudió hasta segundo grado en la escuela, hoy en día está acompañado y su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, sus hijos estudian y ayudan a su papá en el cultivo del maíz y frijol, además en su casa vive el abuelo que también depende de Cruz.


Cruz se dedica a la agricultura, pues ya tiene alrededor 35 de estar trabajando en el campo para mantener a su familia, en la zona donde él vive hay escases de agua, por lo que son pocas hortalizas las que puede cultivar, él trabaja 5 horas diarias ya sea en lo propio o trabajando como jornalero. 


El préstamo solicitado a CrediCampo lo invertirá para comprar  fertilizantes que necesitará para lo producción de maíz, con ello estará mejorando su producción y estará satisfaciendo la necesidad de poder fertilizar a tiempo.

Su sueño es sacar a la venta sus productos agrícolas.
texts.en:
Cruz is 42, studied through second grade in school, and is married.  His wife is engaged in domestic chores, and his children study and help their father to cultivate corn and beans.  Grandpa also lives in their house and depends on Cruz.

Cruz makes a living in agriculture, and already has put in around 35 years in this work to support his family.  In the area when he lives, there is a scarcity of water and therefore it is possible to cultivate only a few vegetables.  Cruz works 5 hours a day either in his own business or as a laborer.

The loan Cruz is requesting through CrediCampo will be invested to buy fertilizers necessary for the production of corn, thereby improving production and meeting the need to fertilize in time.

Cruz' dream is to bring his agricultural products to sale.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers necessary for the production of corn.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay medical expenses

loans.name: Reyes Gaspar

texts.es:
Reyes tiene 62 años de edad, tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar hasta sexto grado, actualmente está casado, su esposa se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene cuatro hijos, tres que ya son mayores de edad y uno que aún esta pequeño.

Reyes se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 15 años, esto lo aprendió de su padre que en sus tiempos libres lo llevaba a la milpa para que le ayudara y al mismo tiempo fuera aprendiendo, y trabaja de 6:00 AM  a 12:00 MD.

El crédito lo necesita para invertir en un saco de abono, semilla de maíz, frijol y otros fertilizantes que se necesitan para la siembra y para darle seguimiento a la milpa, él siente que va a mejorar porque tiene pensado sembrar una hectárea y media de maíz y frijol.

Sus sueños, deseos y esperanzas es que Dios le de salud, y que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Reyes is 62 years old. He had the opportunity to go to school through the sixth grade. He is now married. His wife does the housework. They have four children, three who are already adults and one who is still young.

Reyes has worked in agriculture for 15 years. He learned this work from his father, who in his free time took him to the fields so that he could help him, and at the same time he was learning. He works from 6:00 am to 12:00 noon.

He needs the loan to invest in a sack of compost, corn and bean seeds, and other fertilizers that are needed for planting and to follow up in the fields. He feels that he is going to do better, because he is thinking of planting a hectare and a half of corn and beans.

His dreams, desires, and hopes are that God gives him health and that his children can finish school.

loans.use: to invest in a sack of compost, corn and bean seeds, and other fertilizers, and to follow up with his plot of land

loans.name: Suma Sartasiñani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SUMA SARTASIÑANI” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Ana es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de cosméticos, tejido de busos, macramé de mantas, tienda de abarrotes, costura de chamarras, librería, venta de ollas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Ana es integrante, ella indica que hace nueve años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de ropa de aluminio; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio cuando se casó, ya que su esposo comercializaba estos productos, con un capital obtenido en Pro Mujer decide implementar su negocio independientemente.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa de aluminio por mayor) que adquirirá de los mercados fronterizos de Bolivia - Perú y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada  y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank Suma Sartasiñani is starting its fifth cycle with Pro Mujer, within the regional hub of Los Andes. It comprises nine members and is managed by a board of directors where Ana is acting President. The businesses run by the members of this communal bank are varied. They include cosmetics sales, weaving of sweaters and blankets, a grocery store, sewing jackets, a book store, and selling pots.

The loan they are requesting will benefit small microentrepreneurs like Ana. She states she has belonged to Pro Mujer for nine years and joined through a friend who was already a member and invited her. She currently has a business selling aluminum clothing. She states she started this business when she got married, since her husband sold these products. With capital from Pro Mujer, she decided to implement her business independently.
 
She will use the loan she is now requesting to increase capital by purchasing aluminum clothing from the markets on the Peruvian border with Bolivia. She will later sell it at her business space. This work allows her to generate resources in order to support her family, since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the health trainings they offer.

loans.use: to buy aluminum clothing.

loans.name: Mujeres Mañaneras Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “MUJERES MAÑANERAS” iniciará el vigésimo octavo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Los Andes, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Nancy es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de guantes, venta de ropa, tienda de barrio, servicio de telefonía, pensión, venta de polleras, venta de condimentos.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Nancy es integrante, ella indica que hace veinte años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de  venta de ropa; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio anteriormente con un negocio de viaje al interior del país que tenia, posteriormente decide comprar su espacio de venta y se estabilizó en La Paz.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ropa por mayor) que adquirirá de los mercados fronterizos de Bolivia - Perú y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada  y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The "Mujeres Mañaneras" communal bank is starting its eighth loan cycle at the Los Andes regional office of "Pro Mujer". The group has eight members, and is run by a board of directors that has Nancy as its president. The members have different businesses, including selling gloves, selling clothes, a corner shop, offering telephone services, a bed and breakfast, selling skirts, and selling condiments.

This loan will benefit microenterprises in Nancy's group. Nancy herself tells us that she joined "Pro Mujer" 20 years ago, following an invitation from a friend who was a member of the organisation. Nancy currently has a business selling clothes. She tells us that she started this business when she was travelling in Bolivia once. She decided to buy a space to sell her products and to set up in La Paz.

This loan will be used to increase capital by buying clothes in bulk from markets on the border between Bolivia and Peru; Nancy will then sell the clothes at her stall. This work allows Nancy to earn an income to support her family; she is married and has five children.

When asked what she likes about "Pro Mujer", Nancy responds that she likes the health training offered by the organisation.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk.

loans.name: Del Valle Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “DEL VALLE” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Soledad es la Presidenta.
